EmailTemplate.name: Reactivation Campaign Q417.Reactivation_Email_1a
EmailTemplate.subject: Just checking in...
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Greetings from Pivotal!
We noticed that you haven’t been opening our promotional emails lately, so we thought we’d check-in to make sure that you would like to continue receiving our marketing materials.
YES, KEEP THE EMAILS COMING <[[https://content.pivotal.io/welcome-back?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=reactivation-one-2018]]>
Or, if you are tired of hearing from us you can unsubscribe <[[http://connect.pivotal.io/UnsubscribePage.html?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=reactivation-one-2018]]> from receiving these emails by clicking the button below.
I WOULD LIKE TO UNSUBSCRIBE <[[http://connect.pivotal.io/UnsubscribePage.html?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=reactivation-one-2018]]>
Thanks, The Pivotal Team
